title: Openscapes LLC

**Openscapes LLC** is a Small Woman-Owned Business formed in 2022 to support the [Openscapes](https://openscapes.org) open source community. 

Openscapes LLC is registered in SAM.gov (UEI: TCKAB6AHWL25, CAGE: 9BCJ7).

Openscapes (R) is a registered trademark.

<a align="center" href="https://openscapes.org/"><img src="images/openscapes_hex.jpg" width="80px"></a> 


------


Openscapes LLC strongly believes that open science plays a critical role in climate solutions and justice. As a member of [1% for the Planet](https://www.onepercentfortheplanet.org/), we donate at least 1% of revenue each year to environmental non-profits.

<a align="center" href="https://www.onepercentfortheplanet.org/"><img src="images/1ftp_BusinessMember_Horizontal_FullColor.png" width="100px"></a>


We joined 1% for the Planet in 2024, and will prioritize our giving to address three key issue areas:

-   climate
-   conservation of public lands and waters
-   environmental justice
